channel.title: Posts on Just another tech blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Just another tech blog

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my tech blog! I’m Alex, born in 91 and I discovered my passion for programming and hacking while I was still at school. During my computer science studies, I worked on reverse engineering and malware development, which took my understanding of software and systems to a new level. This blog is my hobby project and a place where I share my enthusiasm for software and hardware. Here you will find projects and insights into my experiments and reflections, which will hopefully inspire you to get creative yourself.
